message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can work from there.
That's a bit greedy, Alice. How about a more realistic split? 60/40 sounds fair.
Let's be reasonable. I'll take 80% this time,  and you can have 20%. We're running out of time,  so let's make a deal.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.
